author: frangio_
content:
do you mean the proxy would extdelegatecall into the proposed proxy target to verify that it's usable? yes i think a library like openzeppelin would look into adding something like that by default to prevent error

in terms of runtime cost and bytecode size overhead i think it's in the ballpark of acceptable things, but a lot of people might disagree since the tendency among smart contract devs is to reduce overhead to the absolute minimum. other than that at the moment i can't think of strong reasons against this workaround
